message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. It's a great deal for something worth well over $100 to me. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I can only pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need at least $105 to make this worthwhile. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, I've been considering your offers and I think $100 would be the most I could pay for the product. I hope this aligns with your needs. Looking forward to your response.
